title: Vogue Mexico Adapts Met Gala Formula for Day of the Dead
description: Vogue Mexico on Thursday hosted its third gala celebrating the holiday. “We want this event to be shared globally,” its top editor said.
dc:creator: Oscar Lopez
media:credit: Alicia Vera for The New York Times
media:description: Mexican designer Benito Santos, a gala sponsor, held a fashion show at the event. Some models wore floral headpieces, an accessory associated with Day of the Dead.
